list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add "Mes Matières" view and functionality to manage materials
Introduced a "Mes Matières" page for professors to view and manage their assigned courses. Added functionality to upload and manage course materials via the "Ajouter Matériel" feature. Updated URLs, templates, views, and forms for seamless integration of the new feature into the platform.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: setting app apps for each actor

Add features for student dashboard and database migrations.
Introduced `get_student_dashboard_data` service to aggregate dashboard data like schedule, grades, attendance, and assignments. Created initial migrations for professor models including `Note` and `LectureMaterial` for improved functionality. Updated URLs, templates, and added custom template tags for dynamic dashboard UI and features.

Improve student dashboard with grades features and styling
Refactored `get_student_dashboard_data` to use a proper weekday mapping for schedule retrieval. Introduced a new `notes_view` to manage student grade details with distribution and trends. Updated templates, URLs, and added styling for grades and dashboard UI, including new filtering and Chart.js integration.

Refactor scheduling, add materials view, and improve UI
Renamed schedule view and URLs, introduced materials view, and refined course and notes templates. Updated styles for better usability and added search functionality for materials and grades.

Update project files for Python 3.13 and streamline templates
Upgraded SDK and environment settings to Python 3.13. Simplified and optimized dashboard templates and sidebar structure for better readability and maintainability. Adjusted minor design inconsistencies and improved configuration for GitHub integration.

Update professor dashboard and sidebar for role-based features
Enhanced the professor dashboard to display dynamic stats such as courses, students, and submissions. Updated the sidebar with role-based menu options for professors and students, improving UI/UX and maintainability.

Update professor dashboard and sidebar for role-based features
Enhanced the professor dashboard to display dynamic stats such as courses taught, students, submissions, and total teaching hours. Updated the sidebar to show role-specific details for professors and students, improving clarity and user experience. Simplified view logic and integrated live data into dashboard templates for better maintainability.

Add "Mes Matières" view and functionality to manage materials
Introduced a "Mes Matières" page for professors to view and manage their assigned courses. Added functionality to upload and manage course materials via the "Ajouter Matériel" feature. Updated URLs, templates, views, and forms for seamless integration of the new feature into the platform.

MESSAGE.value: setting app apps for each actor

Add features for student dashboard and database migrations.
Introduced `get_student_dashboard_data` service to aggregate dashboard data like schedule, grades, attendance, and assignments. Created initial migrations for professor models including `Note` and `LectureMaterial` for improved functionality. Updated URLs, templates, and added custom template tags for dynamic dashboard UI and features.

Refactor student dashboard data retrieval logic
Revised logic in `get_student_dashboard_data` by simplifying weekday calculations and improving query efficiency. Introduced mapping for French weekday abbreviations and optimized course-related database queries. Added debug logs to enhance traceability during development.

Improve student dashboard with grades features and styling
Refactored `get_student_dashboard_data` to use a proper weekday mapping for schedule retrieval. Introduced a new `notes_view` to manage student grade details with distribution and trends. Updated templates, URLs, and added styling for grades and dashboard UI, including new filtering and Chart.js integration.

Add "filliere" field to Utilisateur and UI/UX enhancements
Added a new "filliere" field to the Utilisateur model via migration. Improved student views, including new paths, a materials view, and updated dashboard/course templates with enhanced UI/UX features. Fixed minor logic and layout issues in templates and JavaScript.

Refactor scheduling, add materials view, and improve UI
Renamed schedule view and URLs, introduced materials view, and refined course and notes templates. Updated styles for better usability and added search functionality for materials and grades.

Add timetable and assignments views with enhanced UI
Implemented a dynamic timetable view with nested days and hours using `EmploiDuTemps`. Added a new assignments view (`devoirs`) and updated URL structure accordingly. Introduced custom template tags for dictionary lookups and optimized templates with responsive layouts and refined styles.

Update project files for Python 3.13 and streamline templates
Upgraded SDK and environment settings to Python 3.13. Simplified and optimized dashboard templates and sidebar structure for better readability and maintainability. Adjusted minor design inconsistencies and improved configuration for GitHub integration.

Update professor dashboard and sidebar for role-based features
Enhanced the professor dashboard to display dynamic stats such as courses, students, and submissions. Updated the sidebar with role-based menu options for professors and students, improving UI/UX and maintainability.

Update professor dashboard and sidebar for role-based features
Enhanced the professor dashboard to display dynamic stats such as courses taught, students, submissions, and total teaching hours. Updated the sidebar to show role-specific details for professors and students, improving clarity and user experience. Simplified view logic and integrated live data into dashboard templates for better maintainability.

Add "Mes Matières" view and functionality to manage materials
Introduced a "Mes Matières" page for professors to view and manage their assigned courses. Added functionality to upload and manage course materials via the "Ajouter Matériel" feature. Updated URLs, templates, views, and forms for seamless integration of the new feature into the platform.
